name: get_product_s_reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amazon_data_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to products, price, sales and reviews data from amazon in JSON format
API description: Fetches reviews for a specified product using the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier of the product whose reviews are to be fetched.
